1: To the overseer upon the stringed instrument: chanting of the song. God will compassionate us and bless us; his face will enlighten us. Silence.
2: To know thy way in the earth, thy salvation among all the nations.
3: The peoples shall praise thee, O God; the peoples shall praise thee, all of them.
4: The nations shall be glad and rejoice, for thou wilt judge peoples in uprightness, and thou wilt pity the nations upon earth. Silence.
5: Peoples shall praise thee, O God; peoples shall praise thee, all of them.
6: The earth gave her produce; God our God shall bless Us.
7: God shall bless us, and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
